other_title: 文豪ストレイドッグス (Japanese)
plot: Guild has entered Yokohoma city. Along with the city, they want Atsushi of The Armed Detective Agency too. As Port Mafia want the city for themselves, a three way war seems unavoidable. While fighting, Atsushi & Akutagawa find help in strange places. And in the background, Dazai continues his endless scheming.
ending_theme: "Kaze ga Fuku Machi" (風が吹く街; The Town Where the Wind Blows) by Luck Life
